name: Yandere Girls Battle
description:
Three yandere girls, a school on the dead, and a crime lord known only as The Teacher – welcome to one of the yandere rage beat em up games. Arm yourself with sword, black shooter, and panties to battle through eight yandere-infested highschool zombie streets to bring order of the dead school. Relentless, explosive, and addictive as hell – High School Girls Battle is the anime style game of beat-‘em-ups!

High School Girl fighting games joins the ever-increasing line-up of ‘Schoolgirls Fighting’, a yandere girls simulator of free anime fighting game brought back to life on mobile!

FEATURES
– Three playable yandere schoolgirl, each with their own fighters and killer combo simulation!
– Eight rounds of fast-paced brawling action!
– Local Wi-Fi multiplayer support to help you beat the bosses!
– A devastating, lovestruck special attack from the kuudere team!
– Times too tough? Get yandere chan and special attacks via rewarded ads!
